item.title: Version 3.1.1
item.description:
Changes

  • Oculus Account linking has been replaced by an automatic login method that's compatible with Meta accounts thanks to @ahmanwoods
  • Automatic updater has been removed as version releases have become much less frequent
  • Updated the OVR SDK to 32.0.0

Bug fixes

  • Revive: Fixed incorrect field-of-view handling (#1716)
